net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Health_applyAbilityChange
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Apply a change to an ability score and update saves and skills accordingly

arg(0) = Ability modified
arg(1) = Modify the ability by this amount, positive and negative values are supported
arg(2) = Optiona: Apply to this ID, if not passed the current token is used

Updates the toon's properties to reflect the change in the ability.
